public double caculateTotalAmount(List<Order> orders) {
  if (orders == null || orders.isEmpty()) {
    return 0.0;
  } else { // æ­¤å¤„çš„elseå¯ä»¥å»æ‰
    double amount = 0.0;
    for (Order order : orders) {

        amount += (order.getCount() * order.getPrice());
      }
    }
    return amount;
  }
}
